column1: Hildigard Took was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Hildigard was a daughter Gerontius Took and Adamanta Chubb. She died at a young age.
Hildigard come from the Germanic roots hild meaning "battle" and gard meaning "protection".
The hobbits gender is not mentioned ( for example treats Hildigard as a male hobbit)
column2: however Wikipedia:Hildegard is a Germanic female name.

column1: An earlier version of the Took Family tree gives Hildigards birth and death dates as  1235 and .
